data.what_is:
Jobin.cloud is an All-In-One Automation tool to Find and Engage with People important to your business.

* Import profiles in bulk, filter, track, and manage them in auto-updating repositories.
* Easily pick the best to contact and reach out to them in bulk with auto-compiling smart fields.
* Create a multi-channel messaging sequence campaign and flexibly automate your outreach.
* Assign contacts to Jobs, and pipelines, and keep track of all your conversations with timelines, tags, and notes.

Quickly grow your network with unlimited LinkedIn connection requests and create your ultimate database asset.
data.product_description:
Jobin.cloud is an All-In-One Automation tool to Find and Engage with People.

* Import profiles in bulk, filter, track, and manage them in auto-updating repositories finding their email. * Easily pick the best to contact and reach out to them in bulk with smart templates via email or LinkedIn. * Assign them to workflows and keep track of all your conversations with timelines, tags, and notes. 

Quickly grow your network with unlimited LinkedIn connection requests and create your ultimate database asset.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Contains the Free Plans of the LinkedIn Automation, ATS, and Sourcing & Enrichment modules.
plan_features: Unlimited LinkedIn Full Profile import (Job history, skills, education, etc.)
Unlimited LinkedIn bulk extraction from searches, groups, events, and posts
Auto personalizing messaging and emailing smart fields
LinkedIn free and LinkedIn premium integration
Customizable daily LinkedIn invitation, messaging, import, and emailing throttling system
Unlimited leads list, recommended leads, and Recruiter Pipeline import
Unlimited bulk connection invitation limit bypass
LinkedIn Free, Premium, Sales Navigator, and Recruiter integration
All Features listed in the Free Bundle
LinkedIn Free, Premium, Sales Navigator, and Recruiter integration
All Features listed in the Free Bundle
250 contact enrichment credits (contact us for more)
LinkedIn Free, Premium, Sales Navigator, and Recruiter integration
All Features listed in the Free Bundle

pricing_plans.plan_description: This solution is Free due to being in Early Access
plan_features: Sequence LinkedIn invitations, messages, inMails, and emails all interchangeably together
Set conditions in the campaign to personalize what sequence should be chosen for each contact
Directly assign contacts to Pipeline stages as they move along the campaign

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Jobin.cloud?
Jobin's integration with LinkedIn is seamless; I can easily add first connects in bulk rather than one at a time or upload a CVS on the previous platform.
This is the single best thing about it; the comprehensive sourcing; whether a recruiter or another business, this works well.

What do you dislike about Jobin.cloud?
As a recruiter, it does not save resumes on the ATS/Jobin platform. So, you either save it on a drive or cloud; this is too cumbersome for me.
Plus, there is no history regarding the submittal and tracking when we submit a candidate.
This alone sent me to another platform.

What problems is Jobin.cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
The last ATS continued to hike prices, and I had little in return. Most importantly Jobin's search capability within the system is hard to beat.
You can create the ideal candidate profile, and as you source, it will rate the candidates.
And, the colors make it less boring; I know sounds trite but the last system was so monochrome I did not want to open it.

This alone sent me to another platform.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Jobin.cloud?
It's easy to find and search for candidates from LinkedIn.

What do you dislike about Jobin.cloud?
Sometimes ranking system doesn't provide good results.

What problems is Jobin.cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
Jobin.cloud is helping to send LinkedIn direct messages and Inmails.
